ambient: The atmosphere is grand and slightly imposing, emphasizing the massive scale of the walls that protect the city. The sound of wind suggests a high altitude and an open, expansive environment. The scene is quiet otherwise, setting a peaceful but contained tone for the city within. | A tense but one-sided confrontation near the city wall. The atmosphere is filled with the soldiers' casual, drunken complacency clashing with Eren's youthful and urgent fear. | A relatively peaceful and busy street in the Shiganshina District. The sounds of townspeople walking and talking can be heard, contrasting with the intense emotions of the main characters. | A bustling daytime street scene within a walled city. Other townspeople are visible in the background, walking and going about their day. The architecture appears pre-industrial European. The general atmosphere is lively, contrasting with Eren's hidden emotional turmoil. | A tense argument unfolding on a street within the walled city. The atmosphere is one of a false sense of peace being challenged by Eren's passionate anger. | A calm day in a town square near a large gate. The atmosphere is peaceful for the general populace, but tense in the immediate area of the confrontation between Eren and the soldiers. | A tense confrontation in a town square. The casual atmosphere of the off-duty soldiers is shattered by a child's angry and fearful shouting.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] An establishing shot showing the immense scale of the outer wall of a fortified city. The view pans from the gate, showing a military emblem, to a wide shot of the town inside the walls as seen from above.

dialogue.speaker: Sound Effect
dialogue.text: [fwOOOO]

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren and Mikasa are walking through a busy town street. Mikasa observes that Eren has been crying, and he asks her to keep it a secret. They are then interrupted by Hannes, an older man who questions Eren about his tears.

dialogue.speaker: Sound Effect
dialogue.text: [SNIFF]

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: DON'T TELL ANYONE...

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: ...THAT I WAS CRYING.

dialogue.speaker: Mikasa
dialogue.text: ...I WON'T.

dialogue.speaker: Mikasa
dialogue.text: CRYING FOR NO REASON...

dialogue.speaker: Mikasa
dialogue.text: WHY DON'T YOU HAVE YOUR DAD EXAMINE YOU?

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: DON'T BE STUPID! LIKE I CAN TELL MY OLD MAN ABOUT THIS?!

dialogue.speaker: Sound Effect
dialogue.text: [LEAN]

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: WHAT ARE YOU CRYING ABOUT, EREN?

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: M-MR. HANNES!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren and Mikasa are walking through the town and encounter Hannes and other Garrison soldiers drinking while on duty near a city gate. Eren confronts them about their negligence.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: DID MIKASA GET MAD AT YOU FOR SOMETHING?

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: HUH?! WHAT MAKES YOU THINK I'M CRYING?!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: YOU REEK OF LIQUOR !!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: WHAT THE... ?!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: DRINKING AGAIN...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: WOULD YOU TWO LIKE TO JOIN IN?

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: NO... UM... WHAT ABOUT YOUR WORK?

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: OH! WE'RE ON GATE DUTY TODAY.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren confronts Hannes and other Garrison members about drinking on duty, escalating into a heated argument about their preparedness for a Titan attack.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: WE GET HUNGRY AND THIRSTY, HANGING OUT HERE ALL DAY.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: WHAT'S THE BIG DEAL IF LIQUOR HAPPENS TO BE AMONG THE RATIONS SOMETIMES?

dialogue.speaker: Sound Effect
dialogue.text: [WOBBLE]

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: BUT IN AN EMERGENCY, WOULD YOU BE ABLE TO FIGHT DRUNK?!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: WHAT KIND OF EMERGENCY?

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: ...!! I DON'T BELIEVE THIS! IT'S OBVIOUS!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: I'M TALKING ABOUT IF THEY BROKE DOWN THE WALL...

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: ...AND INVADED THE TOWN!!

dialogue.speaker: Sound Effect
dialogue.text: [TWITCH]

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren passionately argues with a group of complacent Garrison soldiers who are drinking on duty, but they dismiss his concerns about the Titan threat with mockery and arrogance.

dialogue.speaker: Garrison Soldier 1
dialogue.text: HEY, EREN! DON'T SUDDENLY RAISE YOUR VOICE LIKE THAT...

dialogue.speaker: Garrison Soldier 1
dialogue.text: HAHAHA... THE DOCTOR'S SON HAS SPIRIT!

dialogue.speaker: Sound Effect
dialogue.text: [RUFFLE]

dialogue.speaker: Garrison Soldier 2
dialogue.text: IF THE BASTARDS BREAK THROUGH THE WALL, WE'LL BE ON TOP OF THE SITUATION.

dialogue.speaker: Garrison Soldier 2
dialogue.text: BUT I TELL YA...

dialogue.speaker: Garrison Soldier 3
dialogue.text: ...THAT HASN'T HAPPENED IN A HUNDRED YEARS!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: B-BUT IT'S DANGEROUS TO FEEL AT EASE LIKE THIS!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: MY FATHER SAYS SO!!

dialogue.speaker: Garrison Soldier 4
dialogue.text: WELL... YOU MAY BE RIGHT.

dialogue.speaker: Garrison Soldier 3
dialogue.text: I'M NOT GONNA SECOND-GUESS DR. YEAGER, THIS TOWN'S BENEFACTOR.

dialogue.speaker: Garrison Soldier 3
dialogue.text: BUT Y'KNOW...

dialogue.speaker: Garrison Soldier 3
dialogue.text: WHEN YOU BECOME A SOLDIER, YOU GET YOUR CHANCE TO SEE 'EM, HANGING AROUND OUTSIDE THE WALL WHILE YOU're ON WALL DEFENSE DUTY OR WHATEVER...

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] In a street within the walled city, Eren angrily confronts Hannes and another Garrison soldier about their complacency and lack of readiness to fight Titans, while Mikasa watches with concern.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: ...AND I JUST CAN'T PICTURE 'EM EVEN PUTTING A DENT IN THIS 50-METER* FORTRESS.

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: THEN YOU'RE NOT EVEN PREPARED TO FIGHT 'EM IN THE FIRST PLACE, ARE YOU?!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: NOPE.

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: W-WHAT THE HELL?! SO STOP CALLING YOURSELVES A "GARRISON" AND MAKE IT THE "WALL CONSTRUCTION CORPS" INSTEAD!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: THAT AIN'T A BAD IDEA EITHER!

dialogue.speaker: Mikasa
dialogue.text: BUT EREN...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: YOU HAVE SOLDIERS ON ACTIVE DUTY WHEN THE SITUATION HAS GONE TO HELL... ON THE OTHER HAND, WHEN THE GUYS AND I ARE MOCKED AS GOOD-FOR-NOTHING SPONGES, THAT TELLS YOU WE'RE ALL LIVIN' IN A TIME OF PEACE, AM I RIGHT?

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Eren overhears Hannes and his colleagues dismissing the Survey Corps. This triggers an internal monologue from Eren about feeling like a caged animal, which Hannes then overhears, reacting with shock and disbelief.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes's Colleague
dialogue.text: IT'S JUST LIKE HANNES SAYS.

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: HELL... I CAN'T UNDERSTAND THOSE GUYS IN THE SURVEY CORPS WHO WANNA GO OUTSIDE THE WALL!

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: BUT IF THEY WANNA HAVE FUN PLAYING WAR, LET 'EM, I SAY!!

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: WE DON'T HAVE TO GO OUTSIDE THE WALL FOR OUR WHOLE LIVES...

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: WE CAN EAT, SLEEP AND SURVIVE JUST FINE HERE... BUT...

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: ...ISN'T THAT...

dialogue.speaker: Eren
dialogue.text: ... LIKE BEING A CAGED ANIMAL?

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: PFFT...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: WHAT A CRACKPOT...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: DON'T TELL ME...

dialogue.speaker: Hannes
dialogue.text: ...HE WANTS TO JOIN THE SURVEY CORPS?
